00043 
00044 Entree& Perte_Charge_Singuliere_VEF_Face::readOn(Entree& s)
00045 {
00046   Perte_Charge_Singuliere::lire_donnees(s);
00047   remplir_num_faces(s);
00048   if (regul_) //fichier de sortie si regulation
00049     {
00050       bilan().resize(3); //K deb cible
00051       set_fichier(Nom("K_") + identifiant_);
00052       set_description(Nom("Regulation du Ksing de la surface ") + identifiant_ + "\nt K deb cible");
00053     }
00054   return s;
00055 }

00065 
00066 void Perte_Charge_Singuliere_VEF_Face::remplir_num_faces(Entree& s)
00067 {
00068   const Domaine& le_domaine = equation().probleme().domaine();
00069   const Zone_VEF& zone_VEF = ref_cast(Zone_VEF,equation().zone_dis().valeur());
00070   int taille_bloc = zone_VEF.nb_elem();
00071   num_faces.resize(taille_bloc);
00072   lire_surfaces(s,le_domaine,zone_VEF,num_faces, sgn);
00073 // int nfac_tot = mp_sum(num_faces.size());
00074   int nfac_tot = (int)mp_max(num_faces.size()); //!< not to count several (number of processes) times the same face
00075 
00076   if(je_suis_maitre())
00077     {
00078       Cerr << "Faces number found in Perte_Charge_Singuliere_VEF_Face : " << nfac_tot << finl;
00079 
00080       if (nfac_tot==0)
00081         {
00082           Cerr << "Error when defining the surface plane for the singular porosity :" << finl;
00083           Cerr << "No mesh faces has been found for the surface plane." << finl;
00084           Cerr << "Check the coordinate of the surface plane which should match mesh coordinates." << finl;
00085           exit();
00086         }
00087     }
00088 }
00089 
00090 DoubleTab& Perte_Charge_Singuliere_VEF_Face::ajouter(DoubleTab& resu) const
00091 {
00092   const Zone_VEF& zone_VEF = la_zone_VEF.valeur();
00093 // const DoubleVect& volumes_entrelaces = zone_VEF.volumes_entrelaces();
00094   const DoubleVect& porosite_surf = zone_VEF.porosite_face();
00095   const DoubleTab& vit = la_vitesse->valeurs();
00096 
00097   int nb_faces = num_faces.size();
00098   int numfa;
00099   double Ud; //!< vitesse debitante
00100   double area;
00101   double coefK; //!< pressure loss
00102 
00103   for (int i=0; i<nb_faces; i++)
00104     {
00105       numfa = num_faces[i];
00106 
00107       for (int j=0; j<dimension; j++)
00108         {
00109           Ud = vit(numfa,j)*porosite_surf[numfa];
00110 // area=zone_VEF.face_surfaces(numfa);
00111           area=direction_perte_charge() < 0 ? zone_VEF.face_surfaces(numfa) : dabs(zone_VEF.face_normales(numfa,direction_perte_charge())); //!< Taking account of inclined plane
00112           coefK=K();
00113 // if (j!=direction_perte_charge()) coefK=0.;
00114           resu(numfa,j) -= 0.5*coefK*Ud*dabs(Ud)*area*porosite_surf[numfa];
00115         }
00116     }
00117   return resu;
00118 }
00119 
00120 DoubleTab& Perte_Charge_Singuliere_VEF_Face::calculer(DoubleTab& resu) const
00121 {
00122   resu = 0;
00123   return ajouter(resu);
00124 }
00125 
00126 void Perte_Charge_Singuliere_VEF_Face::contribuer_a_avec(const DoubleTab& inco, Matrice_Morse& matrice) const
00127 {
00128   const Zone_VEF& zone_VEF = la_zone_VEF.valeur();
00129   const DoubleVect& porosite_surf = zone_VEF.porosite_face();
00130   const DoubleTab& vit = la_vitesse->valeurs();
00131 
00132   int nb_faces = num_faces.size();
00133   int numfa;
00134   double Ud; //!< vitesse debitante
00135   double area;
00136   double coefK; //!< pressure loss
00137 
00138   for (int i=0; i<nb_faces; i++)
00139     {
00140       numfa = num_faces[i];
00141 
00142       for (int j=0; j<dimension; j++)
00143         {
00144 // Ud    = vit(numfa,j)*porosite_surf[numfa];
00145           Ud = porosite_surf[numfa];
00146           double Ud2= vit(numfa,j)*porosite_surf[numfa];
00147           int n0=numfa*dimension+j;
00148 // area=zone_VEF.face_surfaces(numfa);
00149           area=direction_perte_charge() < 0 ? zone_VEF.face_surfaces(numfa) : dabs(zone_VEF.face_normales(numfa,direction_perte_charge())); //!< Taking account of inclined plane
00150           coefK=K();
00151 // if (j!=direction_perte_charge()) coefK=0.;
00152           matrice.coef(n0,n0)+= 0.5*coefK*Ud*dabs(Ud2)*area*porosite_surf[numfa];
00153         }
00154     }
00155 }
00156 
00157 void Perte_Charge_Singuliere_VEF_Face::mettre_a_jour(double temps)
00158 {
00159   Perte_Charge_VEF_Face::mettre_a_jour(temps);
00160   update_K(equation(), calculate_Q(equation(), num_faces, sgn), bilan());
00161 }
